item.title: CVE-2023-1263|2024-08-02T05:40:59.847Z -- niteo -- cmp%20%E2%80%93%20coming%20soon%20%26%20maintenance%20plugin%20by%20niteothemes
item.description: The CMP â€“ Coming Soon & Maintenance plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in versions up to, and including, 4.1.6 via the cmp_get_post_detail function. This can allow unauthenticated individuals to obtain the contents of any non-password-protected, published post or page even when maintenance mode is enabled.
